blocks.title: Introduction
blocks.description: Hello my name is [  ] from the Office of National Statistics. I delivered a card to say we are carrying our a Census Coverage Survey in your area. Could you please spare me a little time for a short interview?

questions.title: Is this address your main residence?

options.label: No
options.description: This address is not my main residence. For example it is my old address, second home, holiday home, business address or is not familiar to me

questions.title: What is your name?
Does anyone else live at {{ metadata['display_address'] }}?

options.label: Yes, I need to add another person
options.description: Include other adults, children, babies, even if they are currently away for a continuous period of up to 6 months

options.label: No, this is not the main residence of any other adults, children or babies

questions.title: Who do you need to add to {{ metadata['display_address'] }}
Apart from anyone already added, is there anyone you need to add, including people who live in a student halls of residence?

options.label: Yes, I need to add someone else

questions.title: Who do you need to add to {{ metadata['display_address'] }}
You said that {{ metadata['display_address'] }} is not your main residence. What type of address is it?

options.label: A previous address from which mail has been redirected
options.value: A previous address from which mail has been redirected

options.label: Student accommodation rented through a private landlord
options.value: Student accommodation rented through a private landlord

options.label: My second home
options.description: For example, somewhere you stay whilst on holiday or traveling, either in the UK or abroad

options.label: This address is not familiar to me
options.value: This address is not familiar to me

questions.title: Is there anyone else who classes {{ metadata['display_address'] }} as their main residence?

options.label: Yes, I need to add another person
options.description: Include other adults,children, babies, even if they are currently away for a continuous period of upto 6 months

options.label: No, this is not the main residence of any other adults, children or babies

questions.title: Who do you need to add to {{ metadata['display_address'] }}
Does anyone else live at {{ metadata['display_address'] }}?

options.label: Yes, I need to add another person
options.description: Include other adults, children, babies, even if they are currently away for a continuous period of up to 6 months

options.label: No, this is not the main residence of any other adults, children or babies

when.value: Student accommodation rented through a private landlord

questions.title: Apart from anyone already added, is there anyone you need to add, including people who live in a student halls of residence?

options.label: Yes, I need to add someone else

questions.title: Who do you need to add to {{ metadata['display_address'] }}
Do all of these people share cooking facilities?
Do all of these people share a living room or dining room?

questions.title: Thank you, you're almost done.
questions.description: Your contribution so far has been invaluable. Before you submit your answers, please provide an email address and/or phone number. We may use these details to ask you to take part in future research at some point before 2024, after which the details will be deleted.

questions.title: Please provide feedback if you have any suggestions on how we can improve this study.
Thank you, please submit your answers.
questions.description:
The information you have provided will be held securely and treated as confidential as directed by the Code of Practice for Official Statistics.

Once you have submitted your answers, this study will be locked and it will not be possible to re-enter the study.
